overview: No Place Is Safe. When you`re in Tera Patrick, every place is a dangerous place. Filled with glory holes, anal sex, and every kink known to man. Paul Thomas presents a Vivid and TeraVision co-production, SEX IN DANGEROUS PLACES, with seven of the most depraved scenes we have ever shot. If your mind tends to go to dangerous places, this is your DVD.
title: Sex in Dangerous Places
